message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. $110 is a bit higher than I was hoping to spend. I'm willing to pay $105.  Let me know if that works for you.
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $108.
